skill.name: pytdc
skill.description: Therapeutics Data Commons. AI-ready drug discovery datasets (ADME, toxicity, DTI), benchmarks, scaffold splits, molecular oracles, for therapeutic ML and pharmacological prediction.
skill.summary: Therapeutics Data Commons. AI-ready drug discovery datasets (ADME, toxicity, DTI), benchmarks, scaff...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: No credential access, environment harvesting, or network exfiltration patterns found. Scripts are local examples for dataset loading, evaluation, and oracle usage.

content.user_title: Explore TDC drug discovery datasets fast
content.value_statement: Drug discovery datasets are scattered and hard to compare across tasks. This skill provides curated TDC datasets, standard splits, and evaluation templates for consistent benchmarks.
actual_capabilities: Load ADME datasets and apply scaffold or random splits
Load DTI datasets and run cold drug and cold target splits
Evaluate predictions with TDC Evaluator metrics like MAE and RMSE
Run benchmark group evaluation with multi seed reporting templates
Score molecules with single or multiple TDC oracles
limitations: Requires PyTDC and its dependencies to be installed
Scripts use placeholder predictions and do not train models
Large datasets can require significant memory and time
Templates are examples and not packaged as CLI tools

use_cases.title: Benchmark a new model
use_cases.description: Compare model performance across ADMET datasets with standardized splits and metrics.

use_cases.title: Screen molecule properties
use_cases.description: Score candidate molecules with oracles such as QED, SA, and GSK3B.

use_cases.title: Prepare training data
use_cases.description: Load TDC datasets and export split data frames for downstream pipelines.

prompt_templates.title: Load ADME data
prompt_templates.prompt: Load the Caco2_Wang ADME dataset with a scaffold split and show train, valid, test sizes.

prompt_templates.title: DTI cold split
prompt_templates.prompt: Load BindingDB_Kd and create a cold drug split. Report unique drugs in train and test.

prompt_templates.title: Evaluate predictions
prompt_templates.prompt: Given y_true and y_pred arrays, compute MAE, RMSE, and Spearman using TDC Evaluator.

prompt_templates.title: Multi oracle scoring
prompt_templates.prompt: Score a SMILES string with QED, SA, LogP, and GSK3B and compute a weighted multi objective score.

output_examples.input: Load Caco2_Wang, run a scaffold split, and report sizes.

best_practices: Use scaffold or cold splits to avoid data leakage
Report mean and standard deviation across five seeds for benchmarks
Document dataset name, split method, and evaluation metric in results
anti_patterns: Mixing train and test molecules across splits
Reporting single seed results for benchmark leaderboards
Using oracle scores without recording the SMILES input

faq.question: What platforms are supported?
faq.answer: The skill works in Python environments where PyTDC can be installed.

faq.question: Are there dataset size limits?
faq.answer: No fixed limits, but large datasets need sufficient memory and time.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with my ML pipeline?
faq.answer: Yes, the scripts output pandas data frames that you can feed into pipelines.

faq.question: Does the skill access my private data?
faq.answer: No, it only loads public TDC datasets and runs local evaluation code.

faq.question: What if a dataset name fails to load?
faq.answer: Verify the dataset name with TDC utilities or the dataset catalog reference.

faq.question: How does this compare to custom dataset loaders?
faq.answer: It provides standardized splits and benchmarks, which reduce setup effort.
